# Root command TUI entry safeguards
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite
stdout 'COMMANDS:'

exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite --no-tui
stdout 'COMMANDS:'

exec env UGH_NO_TUI=1 ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite
stdout 'COMMANDS:'

exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite --no-tui add test task
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite list
stdout 'test task'
